=Ubuntu Linux=

  * Server install from Ubuntu 6.06 Setup-CD
  * Installation of openssh, mysql, python-gdal, 686-kernel
  * Setup of [http://www.howtoforge.com/ubuntu_vmware_server VMWare-Server]
  * Manual download, compilation and installation of [http://www.gdal.org gdal] (version 1.3.2) 

  {{{
  ./configure --prefix=/usr --without-ngpython --with-python=/usr/bin/python
